ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: In order to finish off a Basilius from the side shop.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: To block the enemy pull camp and/or ward the rune spot.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Or if you prefer the extra HP, you can get Power Treads instead.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: If no one on your team is getting it, consider buying it. You are a utility hero after all :)
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Great item if you are having a good game and have lots of money.
ItemTooltips.orchid: If you feel you need to do a bit more damage with your attacks or you need the silence. It comes in nice and cheap.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Relatively cheap item which increases your mana regen by a lot and allows you to land a perfect Powershot.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Core item as you need to be able to position yourself for Shackleshot, also chase and escape. Could be replaced by a Blink Dagger.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: If you need some extra HP.

AbilityTooltips.windrunner_shackleshot: If you are in fear you might get killed early, grab a point in this at level 2, rather than waiting until 4. It hinders your damage output however, as you will have a lower level in your Powershot until level 4.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_powershot: Your only nuke, should be maxed asap. It is also a defensive mechanism - you can use it to get last hits and harass from afar without endangering yourself.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_windrun: Primary escape, should get it first in 99% of the games.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_focusfire: Mainly useful late game and to destroy towers. Early points in it are a waste most of the time.
